name: Coffee Stirrers!
description:
Are you ready to stir some coffee?!

In this fast-paced game, you have to stir coffee and add ingredients to it, all of this in under 60 seconds! How much customers will you serve?

Useful informations :

  • You will lose points if the plate is dirty. Clean up coffee and egg (!) stains by clicking on them. 
  • You need to follow the red arrow accurately or you will lose points!
  • You need to hurry up to max out the points you will win!
  • The game will rank you at the end! Try to achieve SSS Rank!

This game was made in a week for the Weekly Game Jam #159. The theme was "Café".
